about_the_game:
Fabled Realms is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game set in a fantasy world known as the Sacred Grove. It is mainly targeted towards families and younger players.

Unlike most games of its type, combat is not the focus of the gameplay in this game. Players can choose their roles, explore dungeons and fight enemies; but they can also engage in many other activities, which include cooking, pet training, race car driving, card trading, virtual house customization, and others. Socializing between players is also an important aspect of the game. Players can set up profile pages, send links, and chat with each other.

Players can choose their roles, explore dungeons and fight enemies; but they can also engage in many other activities, which include cooking, pet training, race car driving, card trading, virtual house customization, and others. Socializing between players is also an important aspect of the game. Players can set up profile pages, send links, and chat with each other.
